metadata.Title: Tavg - Mean temperature calculation
metadata.Institution: INRA (French National Institute for Agricultural Research)
metadata.Extended description: Computes the mean air temperature for a time step by averaging the current minimum and maximum air temperatures. Inputs: tmin (degC), tmax (degC). Output: tavg (degC). Time step: 1. Algorithm: tavg = (tmin + tmax) / 2.
metadata.Short description: Daily mean air temperature computed as (tmin + tmax)/2.
